entry.title: CDC 2025 Workshop on Large Language Models and Control

entry.content: Our workshop on Large Language Models and Control will take place at the 64th IEEE Conference on Decision and Control in Rio de Janeiro!
entry.summary: Our workshop on Large Language Models and Control will take place at the 64th IEEE Conference on Decision and Control in Rio de Janeiro!

entry.title: Socially-Aware Recommender Systems Mitigate Opinion Clusterization

link.title: Socially-Aware Recommender Systems Mitigate Opinion Clusterization

entry.title: ICLR 2026 Paper Submissions
entry.content: We submitted 3 papers to ICLR 2026: (1) reachability of generative models, (2) design principles for sequence models, and (3) recommender systems in social network settings (preprints coming soon!).
entry.summary: We submitted 3 papers to ICLR 2026: (1) reachability of generative models, (2) design principles for sequence models, and (3) recommender systems in social network settings (preprints coming soon!).

entry.title: Stanford Impact Labs Fellowship
entry.content: I am honored to have been selected as a Fellow of the Stanford Impact Labs.
entry.summary: I am honored to have been selected as a Fellow of the Stanford Impact Labs.

entry.title: NSF NeuroAI Workshop Keynote
entry.content: I had the pleasure of giving the keynote address at the NSF workshop “NeuroAI and Beyond” organized by Prof. Terrence Sejnowski in Washington, D.C.
entry.summary: I had the pleasure of giving the keynote address at the NSF workshop “NeuroAI and Beyond” organized by Prof. Terrence Sejnowski in Washington, D.C.

entry.title: RSS Workshop Presentation
entry.content: Our work interfacing LLMs and robotics was presented at the Workshop on Out-of-Distribution Generalization in Robotics at RSS.
entry.summary: Our work interfacing LLMs and robotics was presented at the Workshop on Out-of-Distribution Generalization in Robotics at RSS.

entry.title: Stanford Science Policy Group Leadership
entry.content: I am honored to have been selected to serve as the Engagement and Education Officer for Stanford Science Policy Group in the 2025-2026 academic year.
entry.summary: I am honored to have been selected to serve as the Engagement and Education Officer for Stanford Science Policy Group in the 2025-2026 academic year.
